amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 801. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used in contravention of the Buy American Act (41 U.S.C. 10a et seq.).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill in contravention of the Buy American Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. Mica.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.
